Class DefaultAudioSettings

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.audio.audioSettings.DefaultAudioSettings
All Implemented Interfaces:
AudioSettingsService
public class DefaultAudioSettings extends Object implements AudioSettingsService
Default AudioSettingsService implementation that persists values to a Preferences node.

Volume properties are initialized from preferences (or fall back to sensible defaults). Changes to the properties are automatically written back to preferences.
